spec.name: Pathé Cinema
spec.description: Pathé Cinema is a modern multiplex movie theater in Casablanca, part of the international Pathé cinema chain. It offers a premium cinematic experience with multiple screens, advanced digital projection, and comfortable amenities, screening a range of international and Arabic films. Pathé represents the highest tier of contemporary cinema entertainment in the city.

people.comment: The French cinema group that operates the multiplex.
